ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup

cookingTips: Brown pepperoni sausage to render fat and develop flavor before adding to dip
Warm dip on low heat or in slow cooker to prevent cream cheese from breaking
Serve with crackers, bread, or vegetables for dipping
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you make this dip creamier or more savory? What seasonings would enhance the flavor profile?
